Description:en: Produce a two-dimensional cross-sectional image of the eye and the orbit.
Cross-sectional images of the anterior segment of the eye
Maps the curvature and shape of the cornea's surface

Fully specified name:en: Optic Nerve Head Optical Coherence Tomography(Optic Nerve Head OCT)
Description:en: Provides imaging of the optic nerve head and the retinal nerve fiber layer
Visualizes blood flow in the retina and choroid

Fully specified name:en: Visual field Examination with Humphrey Visual Field Analyser
Description:en: Assesses the full horizontal and vertical range of a person's vision.
Captures detailed images of the retina,
Highlights blood vessels in the retina and choroid.
